channel.title: [PI] Client error connecting
channel.description:
My friend is trying to play my server but he gets this error. We are trying to get the CacheDownloader to work.
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client. at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java: at client.startUp(client.java:8472) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5759) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Please help, thank you!

item.title: [PI] Client error connecting
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins1991 thomashawkins1991
item.description:
@thomashawkins1991 wrote:

45 people read this and no help i have got the same error lol
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:214)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:144)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:115)
at client.unZipFile(client.java:3365)
at client.downloadcache(client.java:3338)
at client.method67(client.java:3410)
at client.method6(client.java:6853)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47)
at client.run(client.java:4493)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
